gui.graphical

Enum Images

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<Images>
      • gui.graphical.Images
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ROOT, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Images>

     enum Images
extends java.lang.Enum<Images>
implements ROOT
    Graphical - Images
    Set up the paths for all images used in the graphical user interface, allowing to load the buffered image from the enum value.
    Author:
    Renato Cordeiro Ferreira
    See Also:
    Graphical
